content: AC-D RL Rail cut-off disc Longer-lasting cut-off disc for cutting steel railway tracks using fixed rail saws with clamp ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate blade lifespan – Hilti’s abrasive discs for use on railway tracks, engineered so you can get more done with the same blade Helps to speed up railway maintenance and repair – an advanced grain and bond system makes these discs faster, stronger and more durable Built for your working comfort – cut rails with low sparks and reduced vibration Applications Cutting railway tracks using rail saws equipped with a clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Rail Tool type: Rail saw (fixed) Blade / disc thickness: 0.125 in Technical Data | Base material | Rail | Tool type | Rail saw (fixed) | Blade / disc shape | Flat, Type 1 | Arbor size | 25.4 mm ### ITEMS- 436736 - Cutting disc 14x1/8x1 RL SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 436738 - Cutting disc 16x1/8x1 RL SPX - Package Size 10 pc
